project_name: AWS Machine Learning Deployment with Terraform
description: Automated deployment of ML infrastructure using Terraform, including Elastic Beanstalk, API Gateway, Lambda, and SageMaker for model training and real-time inference.

technologies_used.name: Terraform
technologies_used.description: Automates provisioning and management of AWS resources.

technologies_used.name: AWS SageMaker
technologies_used.description: Machine learning service for training and deploying models.

technologies_used.name: AWS API Gateway
technologies_used.description: API management service for exposing endpoints.

technologies_used.name: AWS Lambda
technologies_used.description: Serverless functions for scalable backend logic.

infrastructure.name: SageMaker Deployment
infrastructure.description: Provisioned SageMaker for model training and inference.
steps: Configured SageMaker training jobs and inference endpoints.
Integrated models with API Gateway for real-time predictions.

infrastructure.name: Serverless Architecture
infrastructure.description: Implemented serverless functions using AWS Lambda.
steps: Created Lambda functions for processing API requests.
Set up IAM roles for secure API access.

skills_required.name: Machine Learning Deployment
skills_required.description: Deploying ML models on SageMaker for real-time inference.

skills_required.name: Serverless Architectures
skills_required.description: Using AWS Lambda for cost-effective and scalable compute.

skills_required.name: API Integration
skills_required.description: Exposing ML models as APIs using API Gateway.

skills_required.name: Terraform
skills_required.description: Proficient in deploying complex infrastructures with Terraform.

achievement_log: **2023-11-10**: Led 2-hour technical presentation to government stakeholders. Presented 5+ comprehensive ML solutions addressing environmental data analysis challenges, collaborating with global AI specialists and AWS solution architects. Executed end-to-end ML pipeline from data cleaning to production deployment, including model training, validation, and monitoring. **Result**: Successfully influenced decision-making process, established technical credibility with government officials, and positioned company for future ML initiatives.
